title: Black Family [Thai Movie]
description:
Detail: Comedy
Title: Black Family
Year : 2007
Starring : Nuttawut Sakitjai, Bumrur Phonginsee (Note Chernyim), Pawanrat Naksuriya, Mike Piromporn
Director : Bumrur Phonginsee (Note Chearnyim)
2 VCDs
Sound : Thai
Subtitle: none
Release date : 26 January 2008
Info: http://www.ethaicd.com/show.php?pid=36775 
Movieseer: http://www.movieseer.com/MovieProfileBil.asp?moID=6338&Channel=1
Thaicinema: http://www.thaicinema.org/kit60damfam.asp

Story : 

Black family is a farmer family who owns a farmhouse on a green field. The members of the family peacefully live together in the house until someone from the bank visits them with a bad news - the farmhouse is going to be taken over. They don&#039;t have enough money to redeem their farmhouse, but a bank robbery news lights up a plan to get the money to them. The family moves to Bangkok to rob a bank, but the bank is already occupied by another robber gang. The police thinks the Black family comes to help, so the family is honorably given a bravery shield instead of the money in the bank that&#039;s supposed to be robbed by them. But the plan must goes on, the Black family still needs money to repurchase their farmhouse, so they intend to rob again with a brand new plan
